data.title: ”Sweet Infatuation: Operation Valentine's Day Familia Festival” is Live! [2/16 17:00 Update (UTC+9)]
data.meta_description: Released and of good ratings!! This is the official website of the latest game, from the 'DanMachi' anime series, 'Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?: Battle Chronicle (DanChro)'.
data.meta_site_name: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?: Battle Chronicle
data.text:
Thank you for continuously enjoying “Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?: Battle Chronicle.”

[02/16 17:00 Update(UTC+9)]

We have corrected some inaccuracies in the description of the certain special effects that activate.

We apologize for the inconvenience this has caused.

“Sweet Infatuation: Operation Valentine’s Day Familia Festival” has started as of 12:00 on 2/16 (UTC+9)!

Overview

The Familia Festival is a ranking event where Familias compete against each other to earn the most “Sweet Infatuation Medal (Gold).”

Sweet Infatuation Medal (Gold) can be obtained by clearing the “Exclusive Quests” that are available during the period.

In Exclusive Quests, the amount of Sweet Infatuation Medal (Gold) you can gain increases the more you defeat enemies, but the amount of attempts you can clear in a day is limited.

Defeating as many enemies in 1 attempt is the key to reaching the top of the Familia rankings.

In this Exclusive Quest, an Water Attribute Brownback will appear.

Also, challenging with characters other than those with advantageous attributes will significantly reduce the damage dealt compared to normal quests.

Prepare by upgrading your Electric Attribute Characters.

Also, we have implemented the following features starting from this Familia Festival.

Added the feature to view the points earned during battles in the Familia Festival.

Added a feature that allows you to see how many points each member of the Familia has earned during the Familia Festival.

In preparation for the main ranking event, we have added a quest called “Ranking Battle (Practice)” in the Event’s “Very Hard” tab.

It is the same quest content as the main Ranking Battle, so use it to test for the best setups.

Ranking Battles can be cleared by surviving within the 180sec time limit while defeating monsters that keep appearing.

Upgrade the Characters that can gain you the most medals and aim for the top of the rankings!

Rewards

Below are some of the rewards obtainable from the Ranking Event.

-Ranking Rewards

You can receive event Titles, Selas, and Almighty Bond (Rainbow) based on your ranking.

-Total Point Rewards

You can receive All-Encompassing Falna, Mystical Falna, Selas, and various upgrade materials.

Important Notice

Please note that you can only receive the Familia Festival ranking rewards if you are a member of a Familia.

Event Buff Effect

The event-specific buff effects granted to certain characters are also applicable in “Ranking Battle” and “Ranking Battle (Practice).”

The characters with buff bonuses are as follows:

Icon Character Buff Effect Lady of the Gale: Ryu Lion 20% Naive Youth: Bell Cranel 20%

For details on buffs, please check the notice ““Event “Sweet Infatuation: Operation Valentine’s Day” Now Live”.”

Joining a Familia During the Familia Festival Event Period

If you are not currently a member of a Familia, you may join a Familia during the event period.

You may also create a Familia.

If you are already a member of a Familia, please note that you cannot leave the Familia until the Familia Festival event is finished.

If you earn event points while not being a member of a Familia and then join one, please be aware that the event points you earned prior to joining will not be reflected in the rankings.

Furthermore, event points earned after joining a Familia will be reflected in the Familia’s ranking.

You can still receive ranking rewards even if you join a Familia during the event.

Additionally, if you join a Familia after the end of the ranking quest’s event period, you will not be able to receive ranking rewards.

Period

Ranking Battle (Practice)

2/7 12:00 – 2/19 4:00 (UTC+9)

*Please note that you can play the “Ranking Battle (Practice)” until the end of the event.

Ranking Battle (Main)

2/16 12:00 – 2/19 4:00 (UTC+9)

Ranking Update Schedule

Ranking Events are updated daily at the following times:

02:30 (UTC+9)

05:30 (UTC+9)

08:30 (UTC+9)

11:30 (UTC+9)

14:30 (UTC+9)

17:30 (UTC+9)

20:30 (UTC+9)

23:30 (UTC+9)

*The final ranking will be updated at 18:30 (UTC+9) on the final day of the Ranking Event.

Participation Conditions

Clear Story “Monsterphilia: Episode 4: Let’s Have a Date (Normal)” to join the event.

Important Notice

The event period is subject to change without notice.

Ranking Rewards will be distributed to the Gift Box after the event period ends and as soon as the tally is completed.

If your Familia earns 1 or more event points, all members belonging to the Familia can receive ranking rewards.

If your Familia has earned 0 event points, all members of the Familia will not be able to receive ranking rewards.

If the number of “Sweet Infatuation Medal (Gold)” obtained is the same as that of other Familias, the Familia that achieved the cumulative number earlier will be ranked higher.

“Sweet Infatuation Medal (Silver)” and “Sweet Infatuation Medal (Gold)” are different items with different uses.

“Sweet Infatuation Medal (Gold)” obtained in this event cannot be used in future Ranking Events.

Scene Cards, Battle Items, and Titles that can be obtained as rewards for this event may reappear in the future.

After the Event ends, you will not be able to play Event-specific quests or scenarios.

Items cannot be exchanged after the Event exclusive Exchange is closed.

We hope you continue to support “Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?: Battle Chronicle.”

See Notice List
